message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENT_XFV_PROVIDER_FACILITY_MUST_BE_ENTERED_IF_COMPARTMENT_SELECTED
message.locale: Provider Facility must be entered if Compartment is entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENT_XFV_EITHER_PROVIDER_FACILITY_OR_COMPARTMENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Either Provider Facility or Other Location must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENT_XFV_EITHER_ONE_PROVIDER_FACILITY_OR_COMPARTMENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: One of either Provider Facility or Other Location must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENTPARTICIPANT_XRV_ONLY_ONE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of either Provider Member, User, Registered Participant or Unregistered Participant must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENTPARTICIPANT_XRV_ONLY_ONE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_WHEN_MODIFY
message.locale: Only one of either User, Registered Participant or Unregistered Participant must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENT_XFV_EITHER_ANONYMOUSREPORT_OR_REPORTER_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Either Anonymous Report or Reporter must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENTPARTICIPANT_XRV_ONE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: One of either Provider Member, User, Registered Participant or Unregistered Participant must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENT_CONTACTLOG_XFV_ONLY_ONE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Only one of either Provider Member, User, Registered Participant or Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENT_PARTICIPANT_ROLE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The provider must either be a reporter or play a role in the incident in order for the incident to be recorded against the provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERINCIDENT_IF_INJURY_IS_RESULT_OF_RESTRAINT_ATLEAST_ONE_RESTRAINT_RECORD_MUST_EXITS
message.locale: If an injury is indicated as a result of restraint, at least one restraint record must exist to complete/close the incident.

message.name: TEXT_PROVIDERINCIDENT_EMAIL_TITLE
message.locale: Send an email to the reporter of this incident
